LanguageData.RoyalTitleTooltipMaxPsycastLevelDescript:
The highest level of psycast that this title allows.

{FACTION_name}'s laws prohibit using psycasts without a suitable title. Each time you perform an illegal psycast, there's a chance the psychic signature will be detected, leading to diplomatic consequences.

Psychic signatures can be concealed with a psychic silencer implant.
